liststradecompleteshort.description: 최근 거래 내역 exchange page에서 사용
liststradecompleteshort.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_receipt_avg,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_receipt_dt DESC, od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

listsopenordershort.description: 거래소 미체결 내역 리스트 exchange page에서 사용
listsopenordershort.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_avg,od_receipt_dt FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_id DESC limit ?,?

tradecompletehistoryenv.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('20') AS rowlimit FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=?

tradecompletehistory.sql: SELECT od_action,od_pay_po_ids,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_receipt_avg,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_receipt_dt DESC LIMIT ?,?

tradecompletehistoryactionenv.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('20') AS rowlimit FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? AND od_action=?

tradecompletehistoryaction.sql: SELECT od_action,od_pay_po_ids,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_receipt_avg,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? AND od_action=? ORDER BY od_receipt_dt DESC LIMIT ?,?

liststradecomplete.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_receipt_avg,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_receipt_dt DESC, od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

listsopenorder.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_avg,od_receipt_dt FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_id DESC limit ?,?

listsopenorderenv.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('20') AS rowlimit FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=?

listsopenorder.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt,od_receipt_avg FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

listsopenorderactionenv.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('20') AS rowlimit FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? AND od_action=?

listsopenorderaction.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt,od_receipt_avg FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? AND od_action=? ORDER BY od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

lists.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt,partner FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE od_pay_status!='CAN' AND od_action=? AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_id DESC limit ?,?

cancel.sql: UPDATE mem_open_order_krw_ltc SET od_pay_status=? WHERE od_pay_status<>'OK' AND od_id=? AND mb_no=? limit 1
cancel.sql_cancel_list: SELECT od_action,od_market_price,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE od_pay_status<>'OK' AND od_id=? AND mb_no=? limit 1
cancel.sql_balance: SELECT po_type,po_total as total,po_on_trade as on_trade,po_on_etc as on_etc,po_on_lend as on_lend, (po_total-po_on_trade-po_on_etc-po_on_lend ) as poss  FROM trade_member_point_balance WHERE mb_no=?
cancel.sql_balance_update: UPDATE trade_member_point_balance SET po_on_trade = po_on_trade - ? WHERE mb_no = ? AND po_type = 'ltc'
cancel.sql_balance_update_krw: UPDATE trade_member_point_balance SET po_on_trade = po_on_trade - ? WHERE mb_no = ? AND po_type = 'krw'

envlistopenordershort.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('10') AS rowlimit FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=?

envliststradecompleteshort.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('10') AS rowlimit FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=?

envlistopenorder.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('10') AS rowlimit FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=?

envliststradecomplete.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('10') AS rowlimit FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_ltc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=?

listtradeactionenv.description: 거래소 buy or sell 내역 설정 페이징
listtradeactionenv.sql: SELECT COUNT(od_id) AS totalcount, CONCAT('20') AS rowlimit FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE od_action=? AND mb_no=? AND ((od_pay_status = 'CAN' and od_receipt_coin > 0.0) OR od_pay_status!='CAN')

listtradeaction.description: 거래소 buy or sell 내역 리스트 - 20개
listtradeaction.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE od_action=? AND mb_no=? AND ((od_pay_status = 'CAN' and od_receipt_coin > 0.0) OR od_pay_status!='CAN') ORDER BY od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

regist.sql_balanceupdate: SELECT po_type,po_total as total,po_on_trade as on_trade,po_on_etc as on_etc,po_on_lend as on_lend, (po_total-po_on_trade-po_on_etc-po_on_lend ) as poss  FROM trade_member_point_balance  WHERE mb_no=?
regist.sql_order_sum: SELECT COUNT(*) as order_count FROM mem_open_order_krw_ltc WHERE mb_no = ?
regist.sql_balance_update: UPDATE trade_member_point_balance SET po_on_trade = po_on_trade + ? WHERE mb_no = ? AND po_type = 'ltc'
regist.sql_balance_update_krw: UPDATE trade_member_point_balance SET po_on_trade = po_on_trade + ? WHERE mb_no = ? AND po_type = 'krw'
regist.sql_lock: SELECT cs_mb_nos,update_cnt FROM log_db_lock WHERE cs_is_proc_yn = ?
